dialogue.String: Is everyone here, then?We are in Beadeaux, near the Quadav stronghold.1�
Our mission targets are the Copper Quadav, and only the Copper Quadav. We must eliminate twenty of them each, then retreat and regroup at the rendezvous point.1�
We will disperse and attack from different sides to prevent the enemy from setting up an effective defense.1�
As soon as you've achieved your mission goals, disengage and regroup in the Pashhow Marshlands, in the area just beyond this exit.1�
All right! Come and get me, Coppers!1�
Do not follow his example, please...Let us begin. Good hunting!1�
Your training to become a dark knight is already complete...1�
As long as your blade craves for the souls of your enemies, our paths may cross again.Until then, farewell.1�
I can see this place still lingers in your heart. Here is where it all began--where you set out on your journey as a Dark Knight.1�
You've become stronger. However, you must never forget the souls of those that you have brought down with your mighty blade.1�
You have made many sacrifices to come this far. That is the road you have chosen, but also your sin.1�
However, at the same time, one life cannot continue on without the loss of another. Denying this truth would mean the end of all life in Vana'diel. This vicious circle must continue on.1�
Does the sword you wield shine as dark as the purest ebony? Do you thirst for new challenges that lie ahead? If so, seek out and destroy Gerwitz's Scythe.1�
The scythe will be making its way toward the place where crystals gather. It will replenish its power there and then set out to seek fresh blood.1�
To prove your strength to Gerwitz's beast, seek out the blood of a beast worthy enough and take it to the place where crystals gather. There you can call him.1�
His beast is cautious and will not show itself to me. But to you...to you it may just...1�
W-we're saved! I thought they were going to kill us! Thank you! 1�
We're so glad you came. As long as you carry our packs for us, we can watch the enemy as we make our way to safety.1�
Please, take our things back to Selbina for us. We can run well enough on our own.1�
Once back in Selbina, give them to Thunder Hawk. He'll make sure we get them. Thank you, brave one!1�
A piece of parchment has been nailed here.1�
Do you want to read it?Yes.Not now.1�
Mrahcva dauqe htsi yekllec eht.1�
Vada uqons naem dnuos on.1�
Whaddaya want? You wanna talk to me? Well, I don't wanna talk to you until you got something I wanna hear. Take a hike, buddy.1�
�3����?Didn't think I'd ever hear those words from someone who wasn't a Gob. You know some weird stuff, for a person.1�
There's a story that says some things have their own soul.1�

The 5���� used to be just simple hourglasses. But as they passed through the hands of dozens of people, and even a few beastmen as well, the hourglasses were transformed by all their thoughts and feelings.1�
They have the ability to focus mysterious powers. In our travels through all the lands of this world, us Goblins often come across this sorta thing.1�
Now we come to the fun part. If you want a 3����, I'd be willing to sell one to you. And you should know that only us Gobs can tell if an item has its own soul.1�
You people--heck, even other beastmen--have no idea. I've seen you guys throw away these items like they were junk.1�

They may look like garbage, but souled items are rare and valuable.You still want an hourglass, you gotta cough up 
 gil.1�
You want one, you hand me over the money.Like, with a quickness. So how's about it?1�
What's that you got there? � $����?You're quite the collector for one o' your kind.1�

It might just be a worthless piece o' junk for you, but it's priceless to us Gobs.If you want, I can take it off your hands for 
.1�
I add to my collection, you get some pocket change. A win-win situation, right?So just trade that #���� on over, why don't ya?1�
I got a proposition for you. Before the Great War, a different currency was used in each of the three nations.1�
But when gil became the coin of choice, all the other types of money were done away with. Now the old forms of currency are worthless to anyone besides a collector like me.1�
You've never seen them before? Here, take a look at this.1�

This is the least valuable type. It was part of the currency of  [Bastok/Windurst].Since you were able to find out about the #����, I'm guessing you'll be able to get your hands on a few of these.1�
The three nations all had their different types of money, but I'm only interested in the old currency of  [Bastok/Windurst].Collect enough of them and I'll trade you some other stuff I've got.1�

One's not gonna be enough, though.You bring me 
 	)�������� and I'll trade you a single #����. You don't look real interested, but hold up. I'm just getting started.1�

If you've got 
 	)��������, I'll give you a #����. Either that or I'll trade you for one of the goodies in my treasure hoard. They all go for a different price, however.1�

I didn't think there were people who loved this sorta stuff as much as I do. You really understand what things are worth. I don't give discounts, but you're welcome back anytime.1�
I didn't think there were people who loved this sorta stuff as much as I do. You really understand what things are worth. I don't give discounts, but you're welcome back anytime.1�

Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.1�
Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?1�
I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.1�
Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.1�
What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.The Four Musketeers.Blade of Darkness.Blade of Evil.The Rescue.For the Birds.1�
Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.1�
Boo-hah-hah�`...kupo!1�
Huh? Why aren't you jumping out of your skin in absolute terror?I would've died of fright, kupo!1�
Here, take this as a testament to your courage.Exchange it for the item your partner received so you can prove that you both reached the goal safely, kupo!1�
Return with the evidence of your success to the moogle in town. Handing over your partner's item will prove that you were both able to reach me, kupo!1�
Oh, and here's a picture of how your partner's face looked when I popped out of nowhere to scare you. You should hand this in at the same time, kupo!Kupupupu...1�
This place is crawling with nasties.You should probably head back to town so you can testify to your partner's bravery.1�

If it gets out that I haven't scared the wits out of a single person yet, I'm going to get into trouble, kupo...1�
